name: Escape Death (AxyJapan)
description:
This is a small game I made for the GameDev GameJam 2022.

It's my first game ever so it's very simple since I had little time due to work and little experience. 

I did my best anyway.

I hope you all can just try it out and give me some feedback. 

The game is very simple (didn't have time to insert every mechanic I wanted to).

You have to kill your enemy. Pickup the sword and go attack him.

If you die by stepping on a trapped tile, you will reborn as your enemy, so your position will be swapped with the enemy. Try to remember your steps and kill your enemy.

The game is only 3 levels (the first is a kind of tutorial). Sorry if it's short, but i'll appreciate every comment.

Thank you for taking the time to try it.

Have a good day.
